rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a welcoming foyer, adhering to Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow. This area serves as the transition between the exterior and interior spaces.
A large living room with abundant natural light from east-facing windows. The layout promotes social interaction and relaxation.
A modern dining area positioned adjacent to the living room, allowing for an unobstructed view of the garden.
A well-equipped kitchen with storage and modern appliances. The placement is chosen to ensure proper ventilation and ease of movement.
A dedicated private gym located in a quiet corner, designed for personal fitness with ample space and proper ventilation.
A comfortable master bedroom offering privacy. The positioning supports restful sleep as per Vastu recommendations.
A cozy study area with ample natural light and quiet surroundings for work or leisure activities.

openings.description: Main entrance positioned in the north-west corner to welcome positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Large windows on the south and east sides ensuring natural light penetrates throughout the ground floor.

rooftop_terrace.description: A spacious rooftop terrace designed for relaxation, social gatherings, or private meditation. The terrace includes an outdoor kitchen area and a seating arrangement.

garden.description: An expansive garden incorporating local flora and water elements to enhance the luxury feel while promoting harmony with nature. It features pathways that follow Vastu alignments.
